name: San Beda University
chancellor: Rt. Rev. Austin P. Cadiz, OSB
head: Very Rev. Fr. Aloysius Ma. Maranan, OSB, JCL, Ed.D.
campus: Mendiola, Manila (Senior High School, Tertiary and Graduate Education); Taytay, Rizal (K-12); Alabang, Muntinlupa (Autonomous Campus)
affiliations: PAASCU, CEAP, ALNC, ASAIHL, RENPER (Regional Network for Poverty Eradication), ASEACCU, AUAP, FAAP, BENET (Benedictine Educators' Network) Pilipinas, CBCMMI (Consortium of Benedictine Colleges of Metro Manila, Inc.), ICBE (International Commission on Benedictine Education) , SALT (Swiss-ASEAN Learning and Teaching)
